column1: The data of the Swiss Glacier Monitoring Network (GLAMOS) are freely available (https://www.glamos.ch) and may be used with indication of the source for scientific and non-commercial use.
When using these data, please cite as:

GLAMOS (1881-2021). The Swiss Glaciers 1880-2018/19, Glaciological Reports No 1-140, Yearbooks of the Cryospheric Commission of the Swiss Academy of Sciences (SCNAT), published since 1964 by VAW / ETH Zurich, doi:10.18752/glrep_series.
